word_mean: 大豆，黄豆：一种豆科植物，学名为Soja hispida (Glycine soja)亦称中国豆的果实，淀粉含量少而蛋白质含量丰富，制成的豆粉被用作蛋白质的补充，也可提供一种酶，即脲酶，见urease

entry.def: Soybeans are the same as soya beans .

means.word_mean: 1. a source of oil; used for forage and soil improvement and as food

2. erect bushy hairy annual herb having trifoliate leaves and purple to pink flowers; extensively cultivated for food and forage and soil improvement but especially for its nutritious oil-rich seeds; native to Asia
3. most highly proteinaceous vegetable crop known

Sentence.sentence: He planted soybeans (大豆）sold as cattle feed.
He planted soybeans without paying for the patent
Allow small farmers to grow genetically modified soybeans.

sentences.en: Soybeans are very rich in protein.
sentences.cn: 大豆含有丰富的蛋白质。
